languages.text: "Но я, как и мои партнеры, все же не теряю надежды причаститься вашими богатствами в будущем. К сожалению, Владайму {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}не удалось выстроить крепкие деловые отношения{/d} с Вашей Светлостью. Надеюсь, когда вы вернетесь, мы с вами сможем это исправить".

"But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."
languages.original_text: "Но я, как и мои партнеры, все же не теряю надежды причаститься вашими богатствами в будущем. К сожалению, Владайму {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}не удалось выстроить крепкие деловые отношения{/d} с Вашей Светлостью. Надеюсь, когда вы вернетесь, мы с вами сможем это исправить".

traits.locale_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in establishing a robust business relationship with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “即便如此，我和我的伙伴依然希望等你回来之后，可以继续分享你的财富。遗憾的是，弗拉迪姆{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}没能与你建立稳固的商业关系{/d}，大人。我希望等你回来之后，我们还有机会挽回这一切。”
languages.original_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: “即便如此，我和我的伙伴依然希望等您回来之后，可以继续分享您的财富。遗憾的是，弗拉迪姆没能与您建立稳固的商业关系，大人。我希望等您回来之后，我们还有机会挽回这一切。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「でも私と仲間達は、将来、あなたの富を分けてもらいたいと思っているのです。残念ながら、ヴラダイムは陛下との{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}強固なビジネス関係を構築する{/d}ことはできませんでした。ですが、あなたが戻って来た際には、私たちの間で、この関係を正す事が出来ればと願っています」
languages.original_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: 「でも私と仲間達は、将来、あなたの富を分けてもらいたいと思っているのです。残念ながら、ヴラダイムは陛下との{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}強固なビジネス関係を構築する{/d}ことはできませんでした。ですが、あなたが戻って来た際には、私たちの間で、この関係を正す事が出来ればと願っています」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Pero mis socios y yo seguimos esperando tomar parte en sus riquezas en un futuro. Por desgracia, Vladaym no logró {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establecer una relación comercial sólida{/d} con mi{mf|lord|lady}. Espero que podamos arreglarlo cuando regrese».
languages.original_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: «Pero mis socios y yo seguimos esperando tomar parte en sus riquezas en un futuro. Por desgracia, Vladaym no logró establecer una relación comercial sólida con mi{mf|lord|lady}. Espero que podamos arreglarlo cuando regrese».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Doch meine Partner und ich hoffen noch immer, in Zukunft an Euren Reichtümern teilhaben zu können. Unglücklicherweise ist es Vladaym nicht gelungen, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}eine robuste Geschäftsbeziehung{/d} mit Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft aufzubauen. Ich hoffe, wir beide können das nach Eurer Rückkehr korrigieren."
languages.original_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: "Doch meine Partner und ich hoffen noch immer, in Zukunft an Euren Reichtümern teilhaben zu können. Unglücklicherweise ist es Vladaym nicht gelungen, eine robuste Geschäftsbeziehung mit Eurer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft aufzubauen. Ich hoffe, wir beide können das nach Eurer Rückkehr korrigieren."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Mes associés et moi espérons toujours pouvoir contribuer à votre richesse à l'avenir. Même si Vladaym n'a pas réussi à {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}établir une relation commerciale solide{/d} avec Votre Seigneurie, je ne désespère pas de pouvoir rectifier cette situation à votre retour. »
languages.original_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: « Mes associés et moi espérons toujours pouvoir contribuer à votre richesse à l'avenir. Même si Vladaym n'a pas réussi à établir une relation commerciale solide avec Votre Seigneurie, je ne désespère pas de pouvoir rectifier cette situation à votre retour. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Ancak ortaklarım ve ben, gelecekte zenginliklerinizin bir parçası olmak isteriz. Ne yazık ki Vladaym, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}verimli bir iş ilişkisi kurmak{/d} konusunda başarılı olamadı. Umarım dönüşünüzün ardından ikimiz bu pürüzü giderebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "But my partners and I are still hoping to partake of your riches in the future. Unfortunately, Vladaym did not succeed in {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}establishing a robust business relationship{/d} with Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I hope you and I can set this right upon your return."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak partnerlerim ve ben, gelecekte zenginliklerinizin bir parçası olmak isteriz. Ne yazık ki Vladaym, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'yle {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Min}verimli bir iş ilişkisi kurmak{/d} konusunda başarılı olamadı. Umarım dönüşünüzün ardından ikimiz bu pürüzü giderebiliriz."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
